reviews.review: The steak was damn near cold as soon as they brought it to my table.
This place has some excellent interior decorations but the food has left me wanting. There's a cheaper place nearby with waaayy better food
If I could afford it, I would go here for lunch every day! Maybe even just buy the place myself :)
Pretty cool place, dark lighting. Great for that anniversary date.
I guess they need more staff,  waited 15 min for someone to wait my table, only person around was bartender.
I waited 45 min for my food, AND IT WASN'T EVEN THAT BUSY!
